articles.title: VIR-1388: Clinical Trial of Preventive HIV Vaccine Begins - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Novel vaccine includes NIH-funded technology in development since 2004. A trial of a preventive HIV vaccine candidate has begun enrollment in the United States and South Africa. The Phase 1 trial will evaluate a novel vaccine known as VIR-1388 for its safety …
articles.content:

articles.title: Fly Fitness: How the Iditarod Protein Connects Exercise, Cold Resistance & Cell Repair - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The gene, dubbed Iditarod, seems responsible for exercise’s ability to clean up damaged cells. As the days get shorter and chillier in the northern hemisphere, those who choose to work out in the mornings might find it harder to get up and running. A new stud…
articles.content: Researchers identified a protein in fruit flies that impacts exercise in cold conditions. This protein is related to human irisin, which plays a role in exercise benefits and cold adaptation. The stu… [+3835 chars]
